title: Custom logo
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112229im_/http:/typophile.com/files/sticker_5501.jpg)

Need to digitize this custom logo but don't have higher res image to trace - even a similar font would be great - but I haven't been able to find one with this look.

Thanks

Font: 

 IFC Hotrod 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112229/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")

author: ndmartinxyz

comments.content: It should be **[I. F. C. HOTROD TYPE](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112229/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-1&ffam=I.F.C.%20HOTROD%20TYPE%20-%20Regular&fid=609533f4d374321aa143f1b116df283c&fsize=60&text=OLD%20SCHOOL%20CUSTOMS&wrap=2)** by Anton Krylov (2011, Free for personal use), including the shadow and some white dots that's almost invisible on your sample
